trans-unit.source: Provides a way to create a custom rule in order to check the validity of user input.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke opprette en egendefinert regel for å kontrollere gyldigheten til brukerinndata.

trans-unit.source: When you use the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model, you can associate <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> with your binding object.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] databinding modellen, kan du knytte <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>med binding-objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create custom rules, make a subclass of this class and implement the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å opprette egendefinerte regler, gjør du en underklasse av denne klassen, og implementere den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Optionally, use the built-in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>, which catches exceptions that are thrown during source updates, or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule>, which checks for errors raised by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo> implementation of the source object.
trans-unit.target: Alternativt kan du bruke innebygde <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>, som fanger inn unntak som oppstod under kilde oppdateringer, eller <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule>, hvilke kontrollerer feil i <xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo>implementeringen av kildeobjektet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IDataErrorInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataErrorValidationRule> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: The binding engine checks each ValidationRule that is associated with a binding every time it transfers an input value, which is the binding target property value, to the binding source property.
trans-unit.target: Motoren for binding kontrollerer hver ValidationRule som er knyttet til en binding hver gang overføring av en inndataverdi som bindingen egenskapen målverdien, binding source-egenskap.

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about data validation, see [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer detaljert informasjon om datavalidering [Data Binding oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For information about how to validate user-provided data in a dialog box, see [Dialog Boxes Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner informasjon om hvordan du validere gitt data i en dialogboks i [dialogboksen boksene oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"></xref> class with the specified validation step and a value that indicates whether the validation rule runs when the target is updated.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule"> </xref> klassen med det angitte valideringstrinnet og en verdi som angir om valideringsregelen skal kjøres når målet er oppdatert.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies when the validation rule runs.
trans-unit.target: En av opplistingsverdiene som som angir når valideringsregelen skal kjøres.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to have the validation rule run when the target of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref> is updated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Validering regelen kjøres når målet for den <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"> </xref> er oppdatert; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, performs validation checks on a value.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, utfører valideringskontroller på en verdi.

trans-unit.source: You must implement this method when you create a subclass of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> class in order to create a custom validation rule.
trans-unit.target: Du må implementere denne metoden når du oppretter en underklasse av den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>klassen for å opprette en egendefinert validering.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: Each time the data binding engine transfers a value from the binding target property (from user input) to the binding source property (the underlying data), it checks whether any <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> are defined for that binding.
trans-unit.target: Hver gang dataene bindingen motoren overfører verdien fra bindingen target-egenskap (fra brukerinndata) til bindingen source-egenskap (de underliggende dataene), den kontrollerer om noen <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>er definert for at bindingen.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> are defined for the binding, the engine calls the Validate method on each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> until one of them finds an error or until all of them pass.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>er definert for bindingen kaller motoren Valider-metoden på hver <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>til én av dem finner en feil, eller til alle pass.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about data validation, see [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer detaljert informasjon om datavalidering [Data Binding oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The value from the binding target to check.
trans-unit.target: Verdien fra mål-bindingen til å kontrollere.

trans-unit.source: The culture to use in this rule.
trans-unit.target: Kulturen som skal brukes i denne regelen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Performs validation checks on a value.
trans-unit.target: Utfører valideringskontroller på en verdi.

trans-unit.source: The value from the binding target to check.
trans-unit.target: Verdien fra mål-bindingen til å kontrollere.

trans-unit.source: The culture to use in this rule.
trans-unit.target: Kulturen som skal brukes i denne regelen.

trans-unit.source: The binding expression that uses the validation rule.
trans-unit.target: Bindingsuttrykk som bruker valideringsregelen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Performs validation checks on a value.
trans-unit.target: Utfører valideringskontroller på en verdi.

trans-unit.source: The value from the binding target to check.
trans-unit.target: Verdien fra mål-bindingen til å kontrollere.

trans-unit.source: The culture to use in this rule.
trans-unit.target: Kulturen som skal brukes i denne regelen.

trans-unit.source: The binding group that uses the validation rule.
trans-unit.target: Bindingen gruppen som bruker valideringsregelen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the validation rule runs when the target of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref> is updated.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om valideringsregelen skal kjøres når målet for den <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"> </xref> er oppdatert.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the validation rule runs when the target of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref> is updated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis valideringsregelen skal kjøres når målet for den <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"> </xref> er oppdatert; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets when the validation rule runs.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir når valideringsregelen kjører.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene for enumeration.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationStep"> </xref>.
